cloud.jgo.jjdom.dom

Interface HTMLDocument

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Home, HTMLManipulable, HTMLNode, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    HTMLDefaultDocument

    public interface HTMLDocument
extends HTMLNode, HTMLManipulable
    Author:
    Martire91
    This interface represents an html document

        Parameters:
        elementName - the element name
        hasClosingTag - if is true, it means that the node has a closing tag
        thereCanBeMore - if is true, it means that there can be + tags of this type

        the element
